top_comments_top.body: I really enjoyed SOMA. Really great atmosphere - exploring the bottom of the ocean was scary as hell 👻
I always find myself going back to the Silent Hill trilogy. Fatal frame is nice as well. On PS4, even though it's not really a horror game, Bloodborne really hits the tone of "nightmare" to me.

1. Amnesia Dark Descent
2. Any Games made by Puppet Combo (PC)
3. Escape the Ayuwoki ([Itch.io](https://Itch.io) version not the Steam version)
4. Evil Within
5. SCP - Containment Breach (PC)
6. Cry of Fear (PC)
Outlast is the scariest thing I've ever played.
Not exactly spooky but i suggest you play some superliminal
